title: US/China Trade Talks, Ted Allen, Host of Chopped
itunes:title: US/China Trade Talks, Ted Allen, Host of Chopped
description:
Kevin discusses the latest news on US/China trade talks with Ted Allen, Ambassador for former first lady Michelle Obama’s education initiative, Reach Higher and Host of Chopped, Margaret Talev, Bloomberg News Senior White House Reporter and Marc Ross, founder of Caracal Global.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
